General.Name: Zhejiang Aokang Shoes Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Aokang Shoes Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and retails shoes, clothes, leather goods, hats, bags, and other products in China. The company offers its products under the Aokang, Kanglong, and Red Firebird brands. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Yongjia, China.
General.Address: Qianshi Aokang Industrial Park, Yongjia, China, 325101
